New Records: Trae Young recorded 24 points and 20 assists, setting new career marks for him in a single game; Lauri Markkanen made a season-high eight 3-pointers and scored a season-best 35 points
Key Match Events: Trae Young hit a game-winning 3-pointer from beyond halfcourt as time expired to give the Atlanta Hawks a 124-121 victory over the Utah Jazz; Dyson Daniels contributed with 16 points, seven assists, and six rebounds
Post-Match Reflections: The Atlanta Hawks snapped a three-game skid with the win; the Utah Jazz ended their three-game winning streak
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was highlighted as a potential playoff preview due to the competitive nature and key performances from both teams
